source:
deaths1549.sort_values(ascending=False).plot(kind='bar',title="Average deaths aged 15-49 by different grouping") 
group_labels = deaths1549.sort_values(ascending=False).index.get_level_values('entity').tolist() 
plt.xticks(range(0,len(group_labels)), group_labels) 
plt.xlabel('Group') 
plt.show()
